vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to put forth, mediate, muse, commune, speak, complain, ponder, sing
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to complain
1a2) to muse, meditate upon, study, ponder
1a3) to talk, sing, speak
1b) (Polel) to meditate, consider, put forth thoughts

1a3) 歌唱, 說話
1b) (Polel) 沉思, 考慮
